Hi  anybody know for higher foreign transactions spend (USD2 000 to USD5 000)Is an amaze + general spend card (Citi Prestige etc.) or Trust card/Youtrip will have more cost savings?
How much do u value ur mile?
I think about 1.10 to 1.90c/mile  ğŸ˜…

Take 1000 sgd amount as example.With amaze (2% fee) hence 1020 total. 20$ fee for 1316 miles (valued at 14.5$ at 1.1cpm)Without amaze (bank 3.25% fee) hence 1032.5 total. 32.5$ fee for 2065 miles (valued at 22.75$ at 1.1cpm)Youtrip/trust is better in this case.
Ofc I ignore the amount will contribute to Citi prestige limo rides. You can plug 1.9cpm and redo the calc

If you are very sure about the spending  you can try to research iChange. They do offer you the option to exchange SGD to USD in advance (similar to Youtrip). The exchange rate can be better than Interbank rate
